mapper.select: SELECT t2.* FROM ( SELECT t1.* , ROWNUM rm , COUNT(VBL_NO) OVER() AS tot_cont FROM ( SELECT VBL_NO , VBL_MEM_NO , VBL_BOR_ANSWER , VBL_TITLE , TO_CHAR(VBL_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') VBL_DATE FROM VIR_BILL WHERE VBL_MEM_NO = #{vbl_mem_no} ORDER BY VBL_NO DESC ) t1 ) t2 WHERE rm BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VIR_BILL (VBL_NO, VBL_MEM_NO, VBL_BOR_ANSWER, VBL_TITLE, VBL_DATE) VALUES (#{vbl_no}, #{vbl_mem_no}, #{vbl_bor_answer}, #{vbl_title}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO VBL_DET (VDT_NO, VDT_VBL_NO, VDT_QUANTITY, VDT_PRO_NO) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(VDT_NO), 0)+1 FROM VBL_DET) , #{vdt_vbl_no}, #{vdt_quantity}, #{vdt_pro_no})
mapper.select: SELECT VBL_NO, VBL_MEM_NO, VBL_BOR_ANSWER , VBL_TITLE , TO_CHAR(VBL_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') VBL_DATE FROM VIR_BILL WHERE VBL_NO = #{vbl_no} AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT PRO_NO, PRO_DISPRICE , TO_CHAR(PRO_DISPRICE, '999,999,999,999')||'원' PRO_CH_PRICE , TO_CHAR(PRO_DISPRICE, '999,999,999,999') PRO_CH2_PRICE , PRO_PCL_NO , PRO_NAME , VDT_QUANTITY AS PST_QUANTITY FROM PRODUCT, VBL_DET WHERE VDT_PRO_NO = PRO_NO AND VDT_VBL_NO = #{ppt_no} AND PRO_NO IN (SELECT VDT_PRO_NO FROM VBL_DET WHERE VDT_VBL_NO = #{ppt_no}) AND PRO_PCL_NO = #{pcl_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VIR_BILL_BOARD (VBB_NO, VBB_CONTENT, VBB_MEM_NO, VBB_DATE, VBB_RECOMM , VBB_COUNT, VBB_BTR_ANSWER, VBB_TITLE) VALUES (#{vbb_no}, #{vbl_title}, #{vbl_mem_no}, SYSDATE, 0, 0, 'n', #{vbl_title})
INSERT INTO VBL_DET_SHARE (VDS_NO, VDS_VBB_NO, VDS_QUANTITY, VDS_PRO_NO) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(VDS_NO), 0)+1 FROM VBL_DET_SHARE) , #{vds_vbb_no}, #{vdt_quantity}, #{vdt_pro_no})
mapper.update: update vir_bill_board set vbb_count = vbb_count + 1 where vbb_no = #{vbb_no}
mapper.select: select vbb.vbb_no, vbb.vbb_content, mem.mem_id, to_char(vbb.vbb_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as vbb_date, vbb.vbb_recomm, vbb.vbb_count, vbb.vbb_btr_answer, vbb.vbb_title from vir_bill_board vbb join mem_com mem on vbb.vbb_mem_no = mem.mem_no where vbb.vbb_no = #{vbb_no} order by vbb.VBB_NO desc

select VDS.VDS_NO, VDS.VDS_QUANTITY, PRO.PRO_NO, PRO.PRO_NAME, TO_CHAR(PRO.PRO_DISPRICE,'L9,999,999') PRO_DISPRICE, PRO.PRO_MILEGE, to_char(PRO.PRO_REGDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') pro_regdate, MKR.MKR_NAME, PCL.PCL_NAME, PCL.PCL_NO, PSM.PSM_CONENT, PMG.PMG_FILE FROM VBL_DET_SHARE VDS JOIN PRODUCT PRO ON VDS.VDS_PRO_NO = PRO.PRO_NO JOIN MAKER MKR ON PRO.PRO_MKR_NO = MKR.MKR_NO JOIN PRO_CLASS PCL ON PRO.PRO_PCL_NO = PCL.PCL_NO JOIN PRO_SUMM PSM ON PRO.PRO_NO = PSM.PSM_PRO_NO JOIN PRO_IMG PMG ON PRO.PRO_NO = PMG.PMG_PRO_NO where vds_vbb_no = #{vbb_no} and pmg.pmg_idt_no = 1 order by pcl.pcl_no

select vbr.VBR_NO, vbr.VBR_CONTENT, to_char(vbr.VBR_RDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') VBR_RDATE, vbr.VBR_TITLE, mem.mem_id from vbb_reply vbr join mem_com mem on vbr.vbr_mem_no = mem.mem_no where VBR_VBB_NO = #{vbb_no} order by vbr.vbr_no desc
mapper.update: update vir_bill_board set vbb_recomm = vbb_recomm + 1 where vbb_no = #{vbb_no}
mapper.insert: insert into VBB_REPLY (vbr_no ,vbr_content ,vbr_rdate ,vbr_vbb_no ,vbr_mem_no ,vbr_title) values ((select nvl(max(vbr_no),0)+1 from vbb_reply) ,#{vbr_content} ,sysdate ,#{vbb_no} ,#{mem_no} ,'사용안함')
mapper.select: SELECT t2.* FROM ( SELECT t1.* , ROWNUM rm , COUNT(btl_no) OVER() AS tot_cont FROM ( select btl_no, to_char(BTL_SDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as BTL_SDATE, to_char(BTL_cDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as BTL_cDATE, btl_title from battle order by btl_no desc ) t1 ) t2 WHERE rm BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into battle (BTL_NO ,BTL_SDATE ,BTL_CDATE ,BTL_CONTENT ,BTL_TITLE ) values ((select nvl(max(btl_no),0)+1 from battle) ,to_date(#{btl_sdate},'YYYY/MM/DD') ,to_date(#{btl_cdate},'YYYY/MM/DD') ,#{btl_content} ,#{btl_title} )
mapper.select: select btl_no, to_char(btl_sdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') btl_sdate, to_char(btl_cdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') btl_cdate, btl_content, btl_title from battle where btl_no = #{btl_no} and rownum = 1

select vbj.vbj_no, vbj.vbj_title, vbj.vbj_grade, mem.mem_id, (select sum(pro.pro_disprice * vbd.vbd_quantity) from vbj_det vbd join product pro on vbd.vbd_pro_no = pro.pro_no) totdisprice from vbl_btl_join vbj join mem_com mem on vbj.vbj_mem_no = mem.mem_no where vbj.vbj_btl_no = #{btl_no} order by vbj.vbj_grade desc
mapper.update: update vir_bill_board set vbb_btr_answer = 'y' where vbb_no = #{vbb_no}
mapper.insert: insert into vbl_btl_join ( vbj_no ,vbj_btl_no ,vbj_grade ,vbj_mem_no ,vbj_title ) values ( #{vbj_no} ,#{btl_no} ,(select (vbb_recomm * 3 + vbb_count) from vir_bill_board where vbb_no=#{vbb_no}) ,(select vbb_mem_no from vir_bill_board where vbb_no=#{vbb_no}) ,(select vbb_title from vir_bill_board where vbb_no=#{vbb_no}) )
mapper.select: select vds_no , vds_quantity , vds_pro_no as vbd_pro_no from vbl_det_share where vds_vbb_no = #{vbb_no}

select vbj.VBJ_NO, vbj.vbj_title, vbj.VBJ_GRADE, vbj.vbj_btl_no, mem.mem_id, TO_CHAR( (SELECT sum(pro.pro_disprice * vbd.vbd_quantity) FROM vbj_det vbd JOIN product pro ON vbd.vbd_pro_no = pro.pro_no where vbd.vbd_VBJ_NO = #{vbj_no}),'L9,999,999') totDisprice from VBL_BTL_JOIN vbj join mem_com mem on vbj.vbj_mem_no = mem.mem_no where vbj.VBJ_NO = #{vbj_no} AND ROWNUM = 1

select vbd.vbd_no, vbd.vbd_quantity, PRO.PRO_NO, PRO.PRO_NAME, TO_CHAR(PRO.PRO_DISPRICE,'L9,999,999') PRO_DISPRICE, PRO.PRO_MILEGE, to_char(PRO.PRO_REGDATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd') pro_regdate, MKR.MKR_NAME, PCL.PCL_NAME, PSM.PSM_CONENT, PMG.PMG_FILE from vbj_det vbd JOIN PRODUCT PRO ON vbd.vbd_PRO_NO = PRO.PRO_NO JOIN MAKER MKR ON PRO.PRO_MKR_NO = MKR.MKR_NO JOIN PRO_CLASS PCL ON PRO.PRO_PCL_NO = PCL.PCL_NO JOIN PRO_SUMM PSM ON PRO.PRO_NO = PSM.PSM_PRO_NO JOIN PRO_IMG PMG ON PRO.PRO_NO = PMG.PMG_PRO_NO where vbd.vbd_vbj_no = #{vbj_no} and pmg.pmg_idt_no = 1 order by pcl.pcl_no
mapper.update:
update vbl_btl_join set
vbj_grade = vbj_grade + 5
vbj_grade = vbj_grade - 5
where vbj_no=#{vbj_no}
